item.title: Iventoy
item.description: Introduction iVentoy is another convenient tool developed by the author ( longpanda) of the famous ISO boot tool Ventoy. The goal of this tool is to enable booting and startup through the PXE server without even preparing a flash drive, and the system is also very convenient to use. Deploy SCENARIO01 (step-by-step) Download iVentoy Please use the root privilege to run below commands 1 wget https://github.com/ventoy/PXE/releases/download/v1.0.20/iventoy-1.0.20-linux-free.tar.gz -O /tmp/iventoy.tar.gz Extract the Package 1 tar -xvzf /tmp/iventoy.
